18 constexpr char kXfbBindingsMarker[] = "@@XFB-Bindings@@";
19 constexpr char kXfbOutMarker[] = "ANGLE_@@XFB-OUT@@";
20
21template <size_t N>
22constexpr size_t ConstStrLen(const char (&)[N])
23{
24 static_assert(N > 0, "C++ shouldn't allow N to be zero");
25
26 // The length of a string defined as a char array is the size of the array minus 1 (the
27 // terminating '\0').
28 return N - 1;
29}
30
31std::string GetXfbBufferNameMtl(const uint32_t bufferIndex)
32{
33 return "xfbBuffer" + Str(bufferIndex);
34}
35
36} //

38namespace mtl
39{
40
41void TranslatedShaderInfo::reset()
42{
43 metalShaderSource.clear();
44 metalLibrary = nil;
45 hasUBOArgumentBuffer = false;
46 for (mtl::SamplerBinding &binding : actualSamplerBindings)
47 {
48 binding.textureBinding = mtl::kMaxShaderSamplers;
49 binding.samplerBinding = 0;
50 }
51 for (uint32_t &binding : actualUBOBindings)
52 {
53 binding = mtl::kMaxShaderBuffers;
54 }
55
56 for (uint32_t &binding : actualXFBBindings)
57 {
58 binding = mtl::kMaxShaderBuffers;
59 }
60}
61
62// Original mapping of front end from sampler name to multiple sampler slots (in form of
63// slot:count pair)
64using OriginalSamplerBindingMap =
65 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::vector<std::pair<uint32_t, uint32_t>>>;
66
67bool MappedSamplerNameNeedsUserDefinedPrefix(const std::string &originalName)
68{
69 return originalName.find('.') == std::string::npos;
70}
71
72static std::string MSLGetMappedSamplerName(const std::string &originalName)
73{
74 std::string samplerName = originalName;
75
76 // Samplers in structs are extracted.
77 std::replace(samplerName.begin(), samplerName.end(), '.', '_');
78
79 // Remove array elements
80 auto out = samplerName.begin();
81 for (auto in = samplerName.begin(); in != samplerName.end(); in++)
82 {
83 if (*in == '[')
84 {
85 while (*in != ']')
86 {
87 in++;
88 ASSERT(in != samplerName.end());
89 }
90 }
91 else
92 {
93 *out++ = *in;
94 }
95 }
96
97 samplerName.erase(out, samplerName.end());
98
99 if (MappedSamplerNameNeedsUserDefinedPrefix(originalName))
100 {
101 samplerName = sh::kUserDefinedNamePrefix + samplerName;
102 }
103
104 return samplerName;
105}
106
107void MSLGetShaderSource(const gl::ProgramState &programState,
108 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
109 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> *shaderSourcesOut,
110 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap *variableInfoMapOut)
111{
112 for (const gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
113 {
114 gl::Shader *glShader = programState.getAttachedShader(shaderType);
115 (*shaderSourcesOut)[shaderType] = glShader ? glShader->getTranslatedSource() : "";
116 }
117}
118
119void GetAssignedSamplerBindings(const sh::TranslatorMetalReflection *reflection,
120 const OriginalSamplerBindingMap &originalBindings,
121 std::unordered_set<std::string> &structSamplers,
122 std::array<SamplerBinding, mtl::kMaxGLSamplerBindings> *bindings)
123{
124 for (auto &sampler : reflection->getSamplerBindings())
125 {
126 const std::string &name = sampler.first;
127 const uint32_t actualSamplerSlot = (uint32_t)reflection->getSamplerBinding(name);
128 const uint32_t actualTextureSlot = (uint32_t)reflection->getTextureBinding(name);
129
130 // Assign sequential index for subsequent array elements
131 const bool structSampler = structSamplers.find(name) != structSamplers.end();
132 const std::string mappedName =
133 structSampler ? name : MSLGetMappedSamplerName(sh::kUserDefinedNamePrefix + name);
134 auto original = originalBindings.find(mappedName);
135 if (original != originalBindings.end())
136 {
137 const std::vector<std::pair<uint32_t, uint32_t>> &resOrignalBindings =
138 originalBindings.at(mappedName);
139 uint32_t currentTextureSlot = actualTextureSlot;
140 uint32_t currentSamplerSlot = actualSamplerSlot;
141 for (const std::pair<uint32_t, uint32_t> &originalBindingRange : resOrignalBindings)
142 {
143 SamplerBinding &actualBinding = bindings->at(originalBindingRange.first);
144 actualBinding.textureBinding = currentTextureSlot;
145 actualBinding.samplerBinding = currentSamplerSlot;
146
147 currentTextureSlot += originalBindingRange.second;
148 currentSamplerSlot += originalBindingRange.second;
149 }
150 }
151 }
152}
153
154sh::TranslatorMetalReflection *getReflectionFromShader(gl::Shader *shader)
155{
156 ShaderMtl *shaderInstance = static_cast<ShaderMtl *>(shader->getImplementation());
157 return shaderInstance->getTranslatorMetalReflection();
158}
159
160std::string updateShaderAttributes(std::string shaderSourceIn, const gl::ProgramState &programState)
161{
162 // Build string to attrib map.
163 const auto & programAttributes = programState.getProgramInputs();
164 std::ostringstream stream;
165 std::unordered_map<std::string, uint32_t> attributeBindings;
166 for(auto & attribute : programAttributes)
167 {
168 const int regs = gl::VariableRegisterCount(attribute.type);
169 if(regs > 1)
170 {
171 for(int i = 0; i < regs; i++)
172 {
173 stream.str("");
174 stream << attribute.name << "_" << std::to_string(i) << sh::kUnassignedAttributeString;
175 attributeBindings.insert({std::string(stream.str()), i+attribute.location});
176 }
177 }
178 else
179 {
180 stream.str("");
181 stream << attribute.name << sh::kUnassignedAttributeString;
182 attributeBindings.insert({std::string(stream.str()),attribute.location});
183 }
184 }
185 //Rewrite attributes
186 std::string outputSource = shaderSourceIn;
187 for(auto it = attributeBindings.begin(); it!=attributeBindings.end(); ++it)
188 {
189 std::size_t attribFound= outputSource.find(it->first);
190 if(attribFound != std::string::npos)
191 {
192 stream.str("");
193 stream << "[[attribute(" << it->second << ")]]";
194 outputSource = outputSource.replace(attribFound+it->first.length()-strlen(sh::kUnassignedAttributeString), strlen(sh::kUnassignedAttributeString), stream.str());
195 }
196 }
197 return outputSource;
198}
199
200std::string SubstituteTransformFeedbackMarkers(const std::string &originalSource,
201 const std::string &xfbBindings,
202 const std::string &xfbOut)
203{
204 const size_t xfbBindingsMarkerStart = originalSource.find(kXfbBindingsMarker);
205 bool hasBindingsMarker = xfbBindingsMarkerStart != std::string::npos;
206 const size_t xfbBindingsMarkerEnd = xfbBindingsMarkerStart + ConstStrLen(kXfbBindingsMarker);
207
208 const size_t xfbOutMarkerStart = originalSource.find(kXfbOutMarker, xfbBindingsMarkerStart);
209 bool hasOutMarker = xfbOutMarkerStart != std::string::npos;
210 const size_t xfbOutMarkerEnd = xfbOutMarkerStart + ConstStrLen(kXfbOutMarker);
211
212 // The shader is the following form:
213 //
214 // ..part1..
215 // @@ XFB-BINDINGS @@
216 // ..part2..
217 // @@ XFB-OUT @@;
218 // ..part3..
219 //
220 // Construct the string by concatenating these five pieces, replacing the markers with the given
221 // values.
222 std::string result;
223 if(hasBindingsMarker && hasOutMarker)
224 {
225 result.append(&originalSource[0], &originalSource[xfbBindingsMarkerStart]);
226 result.append(xfbBindings);
227 result.append(&originalSource[xfbBindingsMarkerEnd], &originalSource[xfbOutMarkerStart]);
228 result.append(xfbOut);
229 result.append(&originalSource[xfbOutMarkerEnd], &originalSource[originalSource.size()]);
230 return result;
231 }
232 return originalSource;
233}
234
235std::string GenerateTransformFeedbackVaryingOutput(const gl::TransformFeedbackVarying &varying,
236 const gl::UniformTypeInfo &info,
237 size_t strideBytes,
238 size_t offset,
239 const std::string &bufferIndex)
240{
241 std::ostringstream result;
242
243 ASSERT(strideBytes % 4 == 0);
244 size_t stride = strideBytes / 4;
245
246 const size_t arrayIndexStart = varying.arrayIndex == GL_INVALID_INDEX ? 0 : varying.arrayIndex;
247 const size_t arrayIndexEnd = arrayIndexStart + varying.size();
248
249 for (size_t arrayIndex = arrayIndexStart; arrayIndex < arrayIndexEnd; ++arrayIndex)
250 {
251 for (int col = 0; col < info.columnCount; ++col)
252 {
253 for (int row = 0; row < info.rowCount; ++row)
254 {
255 result << " ";
256 result << "ANGLE_" << "xfbBuffer" << bufferIndex << "["
257 << "ANGLE_" << std::string(sh::kUniformsVar)<< ".ANGLE_xfbBufferOffsets[" << bufferIndex
258 << "] + (gl_VertexID + ANGLE_instanceIdMod * "
259 << "ANGLE_" << std::string(sh::kUniformsVar) << ".ANGLE_xfbVerticesPerDraw) * " << stride
260 << " + " << offset << "] = " << "as_type<float>" << "("
261 << "ANGLE_vertexOut." << varying.name;
262
263 if (varying.isArray())
264 {
265 result << "[" << arrayIndex << "]";
266 }
267
268 if (info.columnCount > 1)
269 {
270 result << "[" << col << "]";
271 }
272
273 if (info.rowCount > 1)
274 {
275 result << "[" << row << "]";
276 }
277
278 result << ");\n";
279 ++offset;
280 }
281 }
282 }
283
284 return result.str();
285}
286
287void GenerateTransformFeedbackEmulationOutputs(const GlslangSourceOptions &options,
288 const gl::ProgramState &programState,
289 std::string *vertexShader,
290 bool earlyReturn,
291 std::array<uint32_t, kMaxShaderXFBs> *xfbBindingRemapOut)
292{
293 const std::vector<gl::TransformFeedbackVarying> &varyings =
294 programState.getLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings();
295 const std::vector<GLsizei> &bufferStrides = programState.getTransformFeedbackStrides();
296 const bool isInterleaved =
297 programState.getTransformFeedbackBufferMode() == GL_INTERLEAVED_ATTRIBS;
298 const size_t bufferCount = isInterleaved ? 1 : varyings.size();
299
300 std::vector<std::string> xfbIndices(bufferCount);
301
302 std::string xfbBindings;
303
304 for (uint32_t bufferIndex = 0; bufferIndex < bufferCount; ++bufferIndex)
305 {
306 const std::string xfbBinding = Str(0);
307 xfbIndices[bufferIndex] = Str(bufferIndex);
308
309 std::string bufferName = GetXfbBufferNameMtl(bufferIndex);
310
311 xfbBindings += ", ";
312 // TODO: offset from last used buffer binding from front end
313 // XFB buffer is allocated slot starting from last discrete Metal buffer slot.
314 uint32_t bindingPoint = kMaxShaderBuffers - 1 - bufferIndex;
315 xfbBindingRemapOut->at(bufferIndex) = bindingPoint;
316 xfbBindings += "device float* ANGLE_" + bufferName + " [[buffer(" + Str(bindingPoint) + ")]]";
317 }
318
319 std::string xfbOut = "#if TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_ENABLED\n if (ANGLE_" + std::string(sh::kUniformsVar) + ".ANGLE_xfbActiveUnpaused != 0)\n {\n";
320 size_t outputOffset = 0;
321 for (size_t varyingIndex = 0; varyingIndex < varyings.size(); ++varyingIndex)
322 {
323 const size_t bufferIndex = isInterleaved ? 0 : varyingIndex;
324 const gl::TransformFeedbackVarying &varying = varyings[varyingIndex];
325
326 // For every varying, output to the respective buffer packed. If interleaved, the output is
327 // always to the same buffer, but at different offsets.
328 const gl::UniformTypeInfo &info = gl::GetUniformTypeInfo(varying.type);
329 xfbOut += GenerateTransformFeedbackVaryingOutput(varying, info, bufferStrides[bufferIndex],
330 outputOffset, xfbIndices[bufferIndex]);
331
332 if (isInterleaved)
333 {
334 outputOffset += info.columnCount * info.rowCount * varying.size();
335 }
336 }
337 if (earlyReturn)
338 {
339 xfbOut += "return;";
340 }
341 xfbOut += " }\n#endif\n";
342
343 *vertexShader = SubstituteTransformFeedbackMarkers(*vertexShader, xfbBindings, xfbOut);
344}
345
346
347sh::TranslatorMetalReflection *getReflectionFromCompiler(gl::Compiler *compiler,
348 gl::ShaderType type)
349{
350 auto compilerInstance = compiler->getInstance(type);
351 sh::TShHandleBase *base = static_cast<sh::TShHandleBase *>(compilerInstance.getHandle());
352 auto translatorMetalDirect = base->getAsTranslatorMetalDirect();
353 compiler->putInstance(std::move(compilerInstance));
354 return translatorMetalDirect->getTranslatorMetalReflection();
355}
356
357angle::Result GlslangGetMSL(const gl::Context *glContext,
358 const gl::ProgramState &programState,
359 const gl::Caps &glCaps,
360 const gl::ShaderMap<std::string> &shaderSources,
361 const ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap &variableInfoMap,
362 gl::ShaderMap<TranslatedShaderInfo> *mslShaderInfoOut,
363 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> *mslCodeOut,
364 size_t xfbBufferCount)
365{
366 const GlslangSourceOptions options;
367 // Retrieve original uniform buffer bindings generated by front end. We will need to do a remap.
368 std::unordered_map<std::string, uint32_t> uboOriginalBindings;
369 const std::vector<gl::InterfaceBlock> &blocks = programState.getUniformBlocks();
370 for (uint32_t bufferIdx = 0; bufferIdx < blocks.size(); ++bufferIdx)
371 {
372 const gl::InterfaceBlock &block = blocks[bufferIdx];
373 if (!uboOriginalBindings.count(block.name))
374 {
375 uboOriginalBindings[block.name] = bufferIdx;
376 }
377 }
378 // Retrieve original sampler bindings produced by front end.
379 OriginalSamplerBindingMap originalSamplerBindings;
380 const std::vector<gl::SamplerBinding> &samplerBindings = programState.getSamplerBindings();
381 const std::vector<gl::LinkedUniform> &uniforms = programState.getUniforms();
382
383 std::unordered_set<std::string> structSamplers = {};
384
385 for (uint32_t textureIndex = 0; textureIndex < samplerBindings.size(); ++textureIndex)
386 {
387 const gl::SamplerBinding &samplerBinding = samplerBindings[textureIndex];
388 uint32_t uniformIndex = programState.getUniformIndexFromSamplerIndex(textureIndex);
389 const gl::LinkedUniform &samplerUniform = uniforms[uniformIndex];
390 bool isSamplerInStruct = samplerUniform.name.find('.') != std::string::npos;
391 std::string mappedSamplerName = isSamplerInStruct
392 ? MSLGetMappedSamplerName(samplerUniform.name)
393 : MSLGetMappedSamplerName(samplerUniform.mappedName);
394 // These need to be prefixed later seperately
395 if (isSamplerInStruct)
396 structSamplers.insert(mappedSamplerName);
397 originalSamplerBindings[mappedSamplerName].push_back(
398 {textureIndex, static_cast<uint32_t>(samplerBinding.boundTextureUnits.size())});
399 }
400 for (gl::ShaderType type : {gl::ShaderType::Vertex, gl::ShaderType::Fragment})
401 {
402 std::string source;
403 if(type == gl::ShaderType::Vertex)
404 {
405 source = updateShaderAttributes(shaderSources[type], programState);
406 // Write transform feedback output code.
407 if (!source.empty())
408 {
409 if (programState.getLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings().empty())
410 {
411 source = SubstituteTransformFeedbackMarkers(source, "", "");
412 }
413 else
414 {
415 GenerateTransformFeedbackEmulationOutputs(
416 options, programState, &source,
417 options.transformFeedbackEarlyReturn,
418 &(*mslShaderInfoOut)[type].actualXFBBindings);
419 }
420 }
421
422
423 }
424 else
425 {
426 source = shaderSources[type];
427 }
428 (*mslCodeOut)[type] = source;
429 (*mslShaderInfoOut)[type].metalShaderSource = source;
430 gl::Shader *shader = programState.getAttachedShader(type);
431 const sh::TranslatorMetalReflection *reflection = getReflectionFromShader(shader);
432 if(reflection->hasUBOs)
433 {
434 (*mslShaderInfoOut)[type].hasUBOArgumentBuffer = true;
435
436 for (auto &uboBinding : reflection->getUniformBufferBindings())
437 {
438 const std::string &uboName = uboBinding.first;
439 const sh::UBOBindingInfo &bindInfo = uboBinding.second;
440 const uint32_t uboBindIndex = static_cast<uint32_t>(bindInfo.bindIndex);
441 const uint32_t uboArraySize = static_cast<uint32_t>(bindInfo.arraySize);
442 const uint32_t originalBinding = uboOriginalBindings.at(uboName);
443 uint32_t currentSlot = static_cast<uint>(uboBindIndex);
444 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < uboArraySize; ++i)
445 {
446 // Use consecutive slot for member in array
447 (*mslShaderInfoOut)[type].actualUBOBindings[originalBinding + i] = currentSlot + i;
448 }
449 }
450 }
451 // Retrieve automatic texture slot assignments
452 if (originalSamplerBindings.size() > 0)
453 {
454 GetAssignedSamplerBindings(reflection, originalSamplerBindings, structSamplers,
455 &mslShaderInfoOut->at(type).actualSamplerBindings);
456 }
457 }
458 return angle::Result::Continue;
459}
460
461uint MslGetShaderShadowCompareMode(GLenum mode, GLenum func)
462{
463 // See SpirvToMslCompiler::emit_header()
464 if (mode == GL_NONE)
465 {
466 return 0;
467 }
468 else
469 {
470 switch (func)
471 {
472 case GL_LESS:
473 return 1;
474 case GL_LEQUAL:
475 return 2;
476 case GL_GREATER:
477 return 3;
478 case GL_GEQUAL:
479 return 4;
480 case GL_NEVER:
481 return 5;
482 case GL_ALWAYS:
483 return 6;
484 case GL_EQUAL:
485 return 7;
486 case GL_NOTEQUAL:
487 return 8;
488 default:
489 UNREACHABLE();
490 return 1;
491 }
492 }
493}

495} // namespace rx
